subject: I dont think name calling is aceptible
author: jba5656
full_text:
I am sorry but I do not think it is aceptible for this FS to call someone a DICK for expessing an opinion or to say BITE ME to that person.

on another group this would not be tolerated the person would be warned on the group and then asked to leave. I have seen this with a few people here and since I spoke up before I hope I will not be insulted.

I am sorry for my earlier post I do not wish to make enimies just learn.

John
